text: The 2019–20 C.D. Veracruz season was the 76th (and final) season in the football club's history and the 7th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
